title: Person of Interest Season 5 Promo (HD)
author: televisionpromosdb
comment: Leonardo got an Oscar before we got a promo.

"The world needs your machine now more than ever." - JOHN REESE
We love you, man!
So excited! Join our countdown to the new season: http://hollywoodredux.com/journal-entry/countdown-to-person-of-interest-season-5-on-cbs/

I have been watching this show ever since the first episode of season 1. It is sad to see the show go, and we better be ready to say our final goodbyes to Reese, Finch, Fusco, Root, Shaw, and Bear! This is going to be 13 episodes of awesomeness.
description:
Person of Interest 5x01 "B.S.O.D." - Reese and Finch attempt to rescue the Machine’s source code before it deteriorates beyond repair. Also, Root fights for her life against an onslaught of Samaritan’s agents and Fusco is faced with hard questions following the deaths of Dominic and Elias, on the fifth season premiere of PERSON OF INTEREST, Tuesday, May 3rd on CBS.
